title: add interface to instance booting from volume failed

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhangyanzi

comments.content:
This error is because of the instance created from block_device_mapping does not have image_ref,

but attach_interface will to get image_meta, then will be failed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhangyanzi

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/38931
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Fixed indirectly by fixes merged for bug #1039662
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rockyg
